"Clipboard Manager helps users manually save, organize, and manage text snippets for quick access and reuse."

Never lose track of important text snippets again! The Clipboard Manager Chrome extension allows you to manually save and organize the content you copy in your browser. Whether you're collecting research notes, URLs, or other important text, this tool helps you keep everything in one place for quick and easy access.

Features:
 - Manual Entry for Clipboard Items: Unlike traditional clipboard managers, this extension allows you to manually enter and save the text you want to keep. Simply type or paste the content into the input field and hit “Save” to store it.

 - Organized History View: View all of your saved items in a neatly organized list. Each item can be easily copied back to the clipboard for reuse.

 - Quick Save: The extension makes it easy to save snippets of text with just a few clicks. Whether you’re collecting quick ideas or compiling longer text, you can store your clipboard items on demand.

 - Delete Old Items: Don’t need something anymore? Simply click the delete button to remove any saved items from the list.

 - Simple Interface: The extension offers a straightforward, easy-to-use interface. No clutter or unnecessary settings—just a clean, efficient tool for managing your text snippets.

 - Persistent Storage: Your saved items are stored locally using IndexedDB, ensuring that they remain available even if you close your browser or restart your computer.

 - Supports Multiple Entries: You can save as many items as you like, keeping all your important content accessible whenever you need it.

 - Notifications: Get a simple notification when an item is saved, ensuring you're always up to date on your clipboard history.

How It Works:
After installation, the Clipboard Manager extension provides an easy-to-use interface where you can manually enter or paste any text you want to save. Just type or paste the content into the input box and click "Save." All your saved items will be stored in the extension's history, and you can view, copy, or delete them at any time.

Why Choose Clipboard Manager?
Clipboard Manager is perfect for users who need a reliable, manual way to store and organize text snippets. Whether you're working on a project, collecting research, or managing frequently used text, this extension helps you stay organized without automatically storing every copy you make. It's designed for users who want control over what gets saved and when.
